name: Forgotten Soul
description:
Forgotten Soul is a third-person action game where you will have to explore the world based on Lovecraft's mythology, to defeat the Ancient Ones, gods of immeasurable power who have invaded Earth.

To do this you must become stronger as you progress in your adventure, with damage, life and power improvements.

In the game our protagonist will be able to acquire soul power, which gives him special abilities that mortals can only dream of, in order to face the different enemies that we will find on our way.

Important to know

It is important to take into account the conditions in which this video game has been developed.

Not only has it been made without any engine (or video game engine like Unity or Unreal) but this version is an Alpha version, which means that it is the first functional version of the game. often this

it means that it is not the version to play without bugs or smooth experience at all. It is usually used for error reporting or for testing mechanics and operation of enemies, etc.
